institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 34 (Agreement Management)
contents: Article 34 (Agreement Management) ① The Chairman shall enter into an agreement with the finally selected center, but may terminate or change the agreement midway if there are justifiable reasons such as the center's abandonment of business, suspension or closure of business, violation of contract, or poor performance. ② Whether to terminate or change the contract early shall be decided by forming an independent separate deliberation committee, but the relevant center must be guaranteed the opportunity to submit opinions. ③ The contract period of the selected center shall be set within the range of 3 years, but detailed information for each institution shall be provided. The contract details and period are determined in consultation with the Ministry of Employment and Labor.
